Summary Dynamic Industrial Engineer who has been performing as an SAP R/3 consultant since 2004. I specialize in Sales & Distribution and LE modules with knowledge in the IS-Oil solution. I have participated in various projects such as process analysis, security, training courses, design, system implementation and support in a variety of companies. I have a solid knowledge in process design, especially in those related with Sales & Distribution and Warehouse Management areas and developed expertise in different industries such as Consumer, Oil & Gas, tobacco, mining and food processing.
